name: bj-pwcfsdom
body: |- wbr(cfv(cale, c0), csdm, co(cfv(cale, c0), cmap, cfv(ccf, cfv(cale, c0))))

stmt.origin: pwcfsdom(hs0, hs1, c0, cmpt(hs0, cfv(ccf, cfv(cale, c0)), cfv(char, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))

body.origin:
|- wbr(cfv(cale, c0), csdm, co(cfv(cale, c0), cmap, cfv(ccf, cfv(cale, c0))))
-| wceq(cmpt(hs0, cfv(ccf, cfv(cale, c0)), cfv(char, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), cmpt(hs0, cfv(ccf, cfv(cale, c0)), cfv(char, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs1, c0)
body.pretty:
⊢ (aleph ` c0)[≺]((aleph ` c0)[↦](cf `(aleph ` c0)))
⊣ (hs0 ∈(cf `(aleph ` c0))↦(har `(hs1 ` hs0)))=(hs0 ∈(cf `(aleph ` c0))↦(har `(hs1 ` hs0)))
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs1, c0)

comment: Remove hypothesis from ~ pwcfsdom . Illustration of how to remove a "proof-facilitating hypothesis". (Can use it to shorten theorems using ~ pwcfsdom .) (Contributed by BJ, 14-Sep-2019.)
